api/PacktLibrary.Utility.html.keywords: Class Utility This class contains utility methods like ConfigureConsole. Sets console encoding to UTF-8 to support special characters like Euro currency symbol, and sets the current culture to one of the following: A default culture of US English (en-US). A specified culture code like French in France (fr-FR). The local computer's culture.
